channel.title: The Swordfish - SlowByDesign [Nostalgic, Electronic, Chill]
channel.description:
This, like a lot of my music, was inspired by the good times me and my older brother had playing Donkey Kong on SNES. Good times. Simpler times.
Because of that - the DK/DK2 soundtrack still gets me. (and just because they‚Äôre fire)
https://soundcloud.com/slowbydesign/enguarde-the-swordfish-1
PROJECT: https://app.auxy.co/projects/YKUihljeMtawguPRLnl6XA==
This one was a bit of a doozie to mix. But a few people on here helped with some great mixing ideas - iammane - sn.ow.y - VJM - OIL - thanks again üôèüèª
PS - I‚Äôm kinda bad at putting a genre to my stuff. If you have an idea - just comment it üëçüèª
